answers.answer: I think thats a sign or preeclampsia you might wanna contact your doctor and inform them.
Thanks :) had a chest and sinus infect last week so was checked for pre eclampsia and said fine just given antibiotics for infections! Il say it at next visit tho :)
You might be retaining a lot of water. I had the same problem, dr told me to bed rest. But yea i would check with ur doctor cause im 35 weeks.

question: Hey all! I am 25 weeks and seem to be getting all the worst symptoms! My feet are huge and as of today my left hand is swollen and numb! Anyone else going through this?? My bump is still small and may not even be noticeable but my hands and feet are! HELP
title: Swollen hands and feet!
